keys: departamento de la tienda de comestibles
comprensión de lectura y que escucha

          </identifier>
          <language>sv</language>
          <title>
            <string language="sv">In the Shop 2</string>
            <string language="en">In the Shop 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Im System 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans le système 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Na loja 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Nel negozio 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Στο κατάστημα 2</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En el departamento 2</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="sv">Here you can read and listen to a dialogue between two friends who are shopping groceries. The dialogue is followed by questions on the content.Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 2 - How Much is it?</string>
            <string language="en">Here you can read and listen to a dialogue between two friends who åre shopping groceries. The dialogue is followed by questions on the content. Safir - English and Working Life for Beginners - Module 2 - How Much is it?</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sv">Safir</string>
            <string language="sv">English</string>
            <string language="sv">language</string>
            <string language="sv">food</string>
            <string language="sv">grocery shop</string>
            <string language="sv">reading and listening comprehension</string>
            <string language="en">Sapphire</string>
            <string language="en">English</string>
            <string language="en">language</string>
            <string language="en">food</string>
            <string language="en">grocery shop</string>
            <string language="en">reading and listening comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>hierarchical</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hier können Sie zu einem Dialog zwischen zwei 
Freunden lesen und hören, die Lebensmittelgeschäft des Einkaufens 
åre. Der Dialog wird von den Fragen über den Inhalt gefolgt. 
Safir - Englisch und Berufsleben für Anfänger - Modul 2 - 
wieviel ist es?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Voici que vous pouvez lire et écouter un 
dialogue entre deux amis qui épicerie des achats åre. Le 
dialogue est suivi des questions sur le contenu. Safir - 
l'anglais et vie active pour des débutants - module 2 - combien 
coûte-t-il ?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Aqui você pode ler e escutar um diálogo entre 
dois amigos que mantimento do shopping åre. O diálogo é 
seguido por perguntas no índice. Safir - vida do inglês e de 
funcionamento para novatos - módulo 2 - quanto é ele?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Qui potete leggere ed ascoltare un dialogo fra 
due amici che drogheria di shopping åre. Il dialogo è seguito 
dalle domande sul soddisfare. Safir - inglese e vita attiva per 
i principianti - modulo 2 - quanto è esso?</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εδώ μπορείτε να διαβάσετε και να ακούσετε ένα 
διαλογικό παράθυρο μεταξύ δύο φίλων που εre παντοπωλεία 
αγορών. Το διαλογικό παράθυρο ακολουθείται από τις 
ερωτήσεις στο περιεχόμενο. Safir - αγγλική και 
οικονομικά ενεργή ζωή για τους αρχαρίους - ενότητα 2 - πόσο 
είναι αυτή;</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Aquí usted puede leer y escuchar un diálogo 
entre dos amigos que tienda de comestibles de las compras åre. 
El diálogo es seguido por preguntas sobre el contenido. 
¿Safir - inglés y vida laboral para los principiantes - módulo
2 - cuánto es él?</string>
          </description>
